title: Asian Stocks Set for a Modest Gain, Yen Steadies: Markets Wrap
description: Asian stocks are set to open higher, brushing off a slide in US benchmarks after latest inflation data did little to dent expectations that the Federal Reserve will pause interest-rate cuts.
content: Asian stocks are set to open higher, brushing off a slide in US benchmarks after latest inflation data did little to dent expectations that the Federal Reserve will pause interest-rate cuts.
